topicTitle: Katkong As Mod on Jail Server

posts.postText: Well I have played on Jail servers for about a month and i know the rules pretty well and im usually the one becoming the warden. I can judge whether it was rdm or if they had a reason. Im generally one to give people chances to see if they are worthy of a ban. Ive been an admin about 2 or 3 times on team fortress 2 servers and i know how to displine people. I am 16 years of age and my voice is not sqeaky...lol that is all :)
I think Katkong should get Admin. He's a good person and he knows the rules of the server pretty well. He's also a good warden and won't let any server rule breaking slide.
Please follow the template in the sticky in this forum.
I've never even seen you on jail, and I know you from another server. You're never on NNJG servers..
